characters.name: Theron Swiftblade
characters.backstory: Theron grew up in the streets of Waterdeep, learning to survive through wit and agility. He was taken in by a retired adventurer who taught him the art of the blade. Now he seeks to uncover the truth about his elven mother's disappearance.
motivations: Prove his worth to the Harpers
Accumulate enough wealth to buy a tavern

traits: Loyal to friends but distrustful of authority
ideals: Freedom: Everyone deserves to make their own choices
bonds: My mother's pendant is all I have left of her
flaws: I can't resist a pretty face or a good bet

relationships.description: Saved each other's lives during their first adventure
Harper agent who occasionally provides information

characters.name: Elena Brightshield
characters.backstory: Elena came to Waterdeep from a small village after her family was killed by bandits. She trained as a paladin in the service of Torm, the god of courage and self-sacrifice. She swore an oath to protect the innocent and uphold justice.

ideals: Justice: Those who do wrong must be held accountable
bonds: I will never forget the faces of those who destroyed my home
flaws: I see things in black and white, with little room for grey

relationships.description: Despite their different worldviews, they trust each other

characters.name: Zephyr Stormcaller
characters.backstory: Born during a fierce storm at sea, Zephyr's innate magical abilities manifested early. Shunned by many due to their infernal heritage, they found solace in studying the arcane. They came to Waterdeep seeking knowledge and acceptance.
motivations: Prove that heritage doesn't define character

ideals: Knowledge: The path to power and self-improvement is through knowledge
bonds: My spellbook is my most prized possession
flaws: I speak without thinking when excited about magic

relationships.description: They often discuss magical theory together

characters.name: Grimble Flintstone
characters.backstory: Grimble left his clan's workshop in the mountains to bring his inventions to the wider world. His gadgets are as likely to explode as they are to work perfectly, but his enthusiasm never wavers. He sees Waterdeep as a treasure trove of inspiration.

ideals: Innovation: Progress comes from trying new things
bonds: My first invention (a clockwork bird) goes everywhere with me
flaws: I get so focused on my work I forget about danger

relationships.description: Collaborates on combining magic and mechanics

notableItems: Bag of Holding (filled with tools and parts)

partyBackground: The party came together during a chance encounter at the Yawning Portal, where they defended the inn against a group of thugs. Since then, they've taken on various jobs around Waterdeep, building a reputation as reliable problem-solvers. They're known to the city watch and several factions, though they try to remain independent.
sharedGoals: Uncover the mystery behind the recent disappearances
Gain recognition from the Lords of Waterdeep
Establish a secure base of operations in the city
achievements: Saved the Yawning Portal from being robbed
Cleared out a nest of wererats in the sewers
Recovered a stolen artifact for the Blackstaff
Helped negotiate peace between two rival guilds
